clown.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: someone who wears funny clothes, a red nose, bright make-up on their face etc, and does silly things to make people laugh, especially at a circus
clown.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: someone who often makes jokes or behaves in a funny way
clown.translation[0].definitions[1].note: class clown (=someone in a school class who behaves in a funny or silly way)
clown.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Frankie’s a bit of a clown.
clown.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: I can’t understand what she sees in that clown.
clown.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to behave in a silly or funny way
